Terrons are primal spirits—although who knows why the titans dreamed them up.

In any event, terrons are particularly sensitive to magical currents. If we could examine them, it might shed some light on why we were attacked.

The {@LinkCreature:13#300944#terrons} are gathered in small groups along the treeline. Kill them and collect the terronite they carry for study.

This should be sufficient. And the incessant giggling has stopped—a welcome bonus.

Let us see. Leander demonstrated this technique...how did it go?

Ah! There we are. A simple test, but an illuminating one. The terrons bear the corruption of dark magic.

Interesting.

Are the samples gathered yet?

My meager skills should be adequate to this task, but it will be for naught without something to study.
